text:
Hello everyone!
A colleague of mine is looking for a US-based development consultant who has experience integrating <https://terminus.com/|Terminus> with HubSpot.
Please message me if interested, thank you!

*Dotsquares: Crafting Digital Brilliance, One Solution at a Time*
With a rich legacy spanning over two decades and a global footprint across the UK, AUS, USA, DUBAI, and INDIA, we stand as your reliable partner for comprehensive digital solutions. Since our inception in 2002, Dotsquares has evolved into a creative and technical powerhouse, specializing in crafting digital experiences that resonate with audiences. Our team of over 1000 professionals has transformed ideas into thriving businesses, making us a trusted name in the industry.
 *1. Comprehensive Digital Services:*
 Dotsquares offers a suite of digital services, including cutting-edge designs, robust development, seamless hosting, and impactful digital marketing.
 *2. Unmatched Expertise:*
 With a track record of 18,500+ projects and 10,000+ satisfied clients, our experience speaks to our dedication and creativity.
 *3. Global Reach, Local Approach:*
 Dotsquares combines global reach with a local touch. With offices in strategic locations, we offer tailored solutions worldwide.
 *4. Holistic Solutions:*
 Our services encompass design, development, hosting, and more, fueling your growth with customized solutions.
 *5. Client-Centric Philosophy:*
 We prioritize partnerships over transactions, focusing on exceptional value and digital success.
 *Empowering Your Business with HubSpot CRM:*
 Dotsquares utilizes HubSpot CRM's five hubs to streamline marketing, sales, service, content management, and operations.
 • Targeted Campaigns: Crafted campaigns resonate with your audience, enhancing engagement and conversions.
 • Automated Sales Processes: Automation boosts efficiency and revenue, eliminating manual tasks.
 • Enhanced Customer Support: We optimize your support system for exceptional customer experiences.
 • User-Friendly Websites: Our design ensures visually appealing, user-friendly websites for seamless navigation.
 • Optimized Business Operations: Efficiency drives productivity with streamlined workflows.
 <https://www.dotsquares.com/technology/crm/HubSpot>
*Embark on Your Digital Journey:*
Experience efficiency, innovation, and growth with Dotsquares and HubSpot CRM. Your digital success story begins here. Explore our Digital Universe and embark on a transformative digital journey with Dotsquares. Let's craft a future where your digital presence shines. :rocket::sparkles:
